svg.title: Count Rusty von Risc-V - RISCVML Mascot
svg.desc: Count Rusty von Risc-V (nickname "Rusty-V"): The RISCVML mascot — a robotic rust-colored crab with a purple transparent neural network brain dome, glowing teal eyes, RISC-V chip die chest with green V emblem, Rust gear shoulder emblems, and dual lightsaber-style energy pinchers — green (RISC-V) on the left and purple (ML) on the right — with 5-layer glow effects on a dark background.
